thread.title: The 8 Best War Movies On Netflix: Good Military Films To Stream
thread.title_full: The 8 Best War Movies On Netflix: Good Military Films To Stream

author: Christian Long
title: The 8 Best War Movies On Netflix: Good Military Films To Stream
text:
Who the hell researched/wrote this list? 
1. We Were Soldiers tells the story of the battle of Ia Drang, not Danang. 
2. Tora! Tora! Tora! in no way, shape or form represents the Japanese word for surprise. It actually means “Tiger! Tiger! Tiger!” 
Also, you call Brad Pitt’s character by the wrong name in Inglorious Basterds. Granted, it’s most likely just a typo, but 3 cock-ups in the first 3 movies. 
I stopped reading after that. Terrible. By: Cuneform 06.07.2016 @ 7:51 PM 
You’re right about We Were Soldiers, and that’s been corrected. But Tora Tora Tora was a WWII code used to relay messages about surprise attacks.
